# Flex



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignContent`   | `align-content`   | This aligns a flex container's individual lines when there is extra space in the cross-axis, similar to how "justifyContent" aligns individual items along the main axis. Corresponds to the "alignContent" css property. | `"center" \| "end" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "start" \| "stretch" \| BreakpointValues<"start" \| "end" \| "center" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "stretch"> & string`           | `'stretch'` |
| `alignItems`     | `align-items`     | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the cross axis.                                                                                                                                                              | `"baseline" \| "center" \| "end" \| "start" \| "stretch" \| BreakpointValues<"start" \| "end" \| "center" \| "stretch" \| "baseline"> & string`                                                         | `'stretch'` |
| `direction`      | `direction`       | Defines the direction of the main and cross axis. The default "row" defines the main axis as horizontal left to right.                                                                                                    | `"column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse" \| BreakpointValues<"row" \| "row-reverse" \| "column" \| "column-reverse"> & string`                                                           | `'row'`     |
| `flow`           | `flow`            | Defines the flex containers content flow if 2 or more containers are siblings of each other.                                                                                                                              | `"block" \| "inline" \| BreakpointValues<"block" \| "inline"> & string`                                                                                                                                 | `'block'`   |
| `gap`            | `gap`             | Defines the gap between contained children.                                                                                                                                                                               | `"0" \| "16" \| "24" \| "32" \| "4" \| "40" \| "48" \| "56" \| "64" \| "72" \| "8" \| "80" \| "a" \| "b" \| "c" \| "d" \| "e" \| "f" \| "g"`                                                            | `'0'`       |
| `justifyContent` | `justify-content` | Defines how the flex items are aligned along the main axis.                                                                                                                                                               | `"center" \| "end" \| "space-around" \| "space-between" \| "space-evenly" \| "start" \| BreakpointValues<"start" \| "end" \| "center" \| "space-between" \| "space-around" \| "space-evenly"> & string` | `'start'`   |
| `wrap`           | `wrap`            | If set, overflowing elements will wrap to a new line.                                                                                                                                                                     | `"nowrap" \| "reverse" \| "wrap" \| BreakpointValues<"nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "reverse"> & string`                                                                                                         | `'nowrap'`  |
